## Sprint 9: V3 Student Portal

**Duration**: 3 weeks  
**Priority**: Low (Optional)  
**Goal**: Student-facing portal with timetable and tasks

### Tasks

- [ ] **Student Authentication**
  - [ ] Student login system
  - [ ] Role-based access
  - [ ] Parent access (optional)

- [ ] **Student Dashboard**
  - [ ] Personal timetable
  - [ ] Today's schedule
  - [ ] Upcoming assessments
  - [ ] Notices for students
  - [ ] Quick links

- [ ] **Timetable View**
  - [ ] Week view
  - [ ] Room information
  - [ ] Teacher information
  - [ ] Room changes

- [ ] **Assessment Calendar**
  - [ ] All assessments
  - [ ] Due dates
  - [ ] Task details
  - [ ] Submission links

- [ ] **Wellbeing Contacts**
  - [ ] Who to talk to
  - [ ] Contact information
  - [ ] Support resources

- [ ] **Student Resources**
  - [ ] Subject resources
  - [ ] Study guides
  - [ ] Past papers
  - [ ] Links to external tools

### Acceptance Criteria

- ✅ Students can log in
- ✅ Timetable displays correctly
- ✅ Assessment calendar is accurate
- ✅ Wellbeing contacts are accessible
- ✅ Mobile-friendly design

### Dependencies

- V1 & V2 complete
- Student authentication system
- Compass student data access

### Notes

This is optional but provides a better experience than Compass for students.
